content: I'm glad you mentioned that. By the way, speaking of bike maintenance, I recently fixed the flat tire on my mountain bike, which had been sitting in the garage for months. Replacing the inner tube and inflating it to the recommended pressure made a huge difference in its performance. Anyway, back to my road bike's brakes - do you think it's worth considering upgrading to hydraulic disc brakes? I've heard they offer better stopping power and modulation.
